violations.suggestion: Separate client classes for synchronous and asynchronous operations.
violations.comment: Service client types should be named with a Client suffix. Use an .aio suffix added to the namespace of the sync client for async clients. Do not combine async and sync operations in the same class.

violations.bad_code: async def __init__(self, endpoint, credential, options: dict)
violations.comment: Accept optional default request options as keyword arguments and pass them along to its pipeline policies.

violations.suggestion: Provide two separate client classes for synchronous and asynchronous operations.
violations.comment: The class name should have a 'Client' suffix. Do not combine async and sync operations in the same class.

violations.suggestion: Remove the connection_string parameter from the constructor and create a separate factory classmethod from_connection_string to create a client from a connection string.
violations.comment: The constructor (__init__ method) must not take a connection string.
